channel.title: The Trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Trade" - Question on village leader bingo.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
Village was at peace time over 4 or something.

Note pages don't work then.

From wiki info on note page:

The Note Page doesn't work if used against a 4+ Peacetime Bonus Village

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
Hrmm sorry to double post but just thought I'd update again real quick.

Tried to bingo a different village leader this time, season 1 this time so no theme to mess with, and within a few hours of the dayroll.

Still wasn't able to use a note page on them, the whole "Village is helping them too much" (on the first round).

Guess this is just some bonus for being the leader, everyone charges to your defense right away?

Anyway, if anyone knows for certain please let me know, otherwise this is just info for folks who end up searching for it like I did.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
Ah, if it helps the error message was something along the lines of "You don't have time to write their name because their village is helping them." So I wasn't sure if that was a bonus for being the Kage or something like a theme.

Thanks folks, appreciate the help! Guess I'll try again today if I can get some glowing goo.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded: Did you bingo the Kage of an advanced village??If you do,they must have Tools of the Trade or he is on Season2+ and has the "My Name Is" theme.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded: There's a theme that makes you immune to Note Pages, I believeâ€¦

item.title: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
Greetings Folks,

Seems like you got a nice community here and I'm trying to find a piece of information that I can't recall if I read some where before or not.

Recently tried to get The Trade done after a failed attempt yesterday, got myself 5 more apples and went to bingo a village leader with my handy note page and couldn't!

Did I just pick a target who is a bit too strong or can you never use a note page on village leaders? Does a Season 1 SP. Jounin (tai) with 15/14/15 levels stand any chance at scoring a bingo against a village leader?

Any advice would be appreciated before I run off and get myself bingo'd yet again by attempting this.

Thanks ahead of time.
